title: Classic Pancakes
steps: In a large bowl, whisk together flour, baking powder, and salt.
In a separate bowl, beat the egg and mix with milk until smooth.
Gradually pour the wet mixture into the dry ingredients while stirring until no lumps remain.
Heat a non-stick skillet over medium heat and lightly grease with butter.
Pour 1/4 cup of batter for each pancake and cook until bubbles form, then flip and cook the other side until golden.
Serve warm with butter, honey, or maple syrup.

title: Tomato Omelette
steps: Crack the eggs into a bowl and whisk with salt and pepper.
Chop tomatoes and onions finely and mix them into the beaten eggs.
Heat oil in a pan over medium heat and pour the mixture in.
Cook for 2-3 minutes until the bottom is set, then flip and cook the other side.
Serve warm with bread or toast.

title: Veg Stir Fry
steps: Chop all vegetables into bite-sized pieces.
Heat oil in a wok and add minced garlic.
Add all the vegetables and stir-fry on high heat for 4-5 minutes.
Pour in soy sauce and mix until evenly coated.
Serve hot with rice or noodles.

title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
steps: Spread butter on both sides of the bread slices.
Place cheese between two slices to form a sandwich.
Heat a pan and cook each side until golden brown and the cheese melts.
Serve hot with ketchup or soup.

title: Chicken Curry
steps: Heat oil in a pan and sauté chopped onions until golden.
Add minced garlic and spices; stir for 30 seconds.
Add tomatoes and cook until soft and blended.
Add chicken pieces and stir until coated with the sauce.
Cover and cook for 25-30 minutes until the chicken is fully cooked.
Garnish with coriander and serve with rice or roti.

title: Chickpea Salad
steps: Rinse and drain the chickpeas.
Chop cucumber and tomato into small cubes.
Combine all in a bowl and drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice.
Season with salt and toss well.
Serve chilled.

title: Spaghetti Aglio e Olio
steps: Boil spaghetti in salted water until al dente, then drain.
Heat olive oil in a pan and add sliced garlic and chili flakes.
Sauté until fragrant and lightly golden.
Add cooked pasta and toss to coat evenly.
Garnish with chopped parsley and serve hot.

title: Masala Scrambled Eggs
steps: Heat oil in a pan and sauté onions until translucent.
Add chopped tomatoes and cook until soft.
Beat eggs with salt and turmeric, then pour into the pan.
Stir continuously until eggs are softly scrambled.
Serve hot with toast or roti.

title: Fruit Yogurt Parfait
steps: Chop fruits such as apple, banana, and berries.
In a glass, layer yogurt, fruits, and granola.
Drizzle honey on top and serve immediately.

title: Bean Burrito
steps: Warm the tortilla on a pan for 30 seconds on each side.
Spread a layer of beans, followed by cheese, salsa, and lettuce.
Roll the tortilla tightly and serve warm.
